stlearn.pp.log1pÂ¶

stlearn.pp.log1p(adata: Union[anndata._core.anndata.AnnData, numpy.ndarray, scipy.sparse.base.spmatrix], copy: bool = False, chunked: bool = False, chunk_size: Optional[int] = None, base: Optional[float] = None) → Optional[anndata._core.anndata.AnnData][source]Â¶

Wrap function of scanpy.pp.log1p Copyright (c) 2017 F. Alexander Wolf, P. Angerer, Theis Lab

Logarithmize the data matrix. Computes \(X = \log(X + 1)\), where \(log\) denotes the natural logarithm unless a different base is given. :param data: The (annotated) data matrix of shape n_obs Ã n_vars.

Rows correspond to cells and columns to genes.

Parameters

  • copy â If an AnnData is passed, determines whether a copy is returned.

  • chunked â Process the data matrix in chunks, which will save memory. Applies only to AnnData.

  • chunk_size â n_obs of the chunks to process the data in.

  • base â Base of the logarithm. Natural logarithm is used by default.

Returns

Return type

Returns or updates data, depending on copy.
